name: Spice Villa
history: Spice Villa was founded in 2005 to bring traditional Indian flavors to a modern audience.
offers: Free dessert with every main course on weekends

name: Pasta Place
history: Pasta Place opened in 2010 to bring authentic Italian cuisine to India using imported ingredients and traditional recipes.
offers: Buy 1 Get 1 Free on Pasta Tuesdays
Free garlic bread with every order above ₹600

name: Sushi World
history: Sushi World brings authentic Japanese sushi culture to Bangalore with precision and passion since 2012.
offers: Free miso soup with every sushi platter
Buy 1 Get 1 on select rolls (Monday only)

name: The Burger Hub
history: Founded in 2010, The Burger Hub has become a staple in Chennai for American-style gourmet burgers.
offers: Free fries with every large burger combo

name: Madras Cafe
history: Madras Cafe has served authentic South Indian dishes since 1998. With its traditional décor and homely food, it's a favorite breakfast spot for locals.
offers: Free filter coffee with breakfast combo
15% off on all meals before 10 AM

name: Anjappar Chettinad Restaurant
history: Established in 1964, Anjappar has become a global name for authentic Chettinad cuisine. It’s known for bold spices and traditional recipes.
offers: Buy 2 get 1 free on Chettinad Chicken during weekdays

name: Sangeetha Veg Restaurant
history: Sangeetha Veg Restaurant has been serving wholesome vegetarian meals rooted in South Indian tradition for over three decades. Known for clean dining and consistent taste, it's a local favorite.

name: Dindigul Thalappakatti
address: 88 Race Course Road, Tiruchirappalli, Tamil Nadu
history: Founded in 1957, Dindigul Thalappakatti is a legendary biryani brand known for its authentic Dindigul-style biryani made with Seeraga Samba rice and secret spice blends.
offers: Flat 15% off on all family packs
